name: RetrieveBoxHubDetails
description:
Fetch Box Hub details using its ID.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about a specific Box Hub by providing its unique identifier.

parameters.name: box_hub_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID representing a Box Hub, found in the URL when visiting the hub.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a hub.

The ID for any hub can be determined
by visiting this hub in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/hubs/123`
the `hub_id` is `123`.
